articles.title: Ask HN: How to break into software eng after graduating with no internships?
articles.description:
I'm graduating this semester with zero internship experience. I've done some software development as an undergraduate research assistant, but I still feel underqualified for full-time software engineer roles. At the same time, I'm excluded from the typical internship path since I'm graduating.

Any advice for breaking into the industry?

articles.title: Show HN: R) Repair Micro Pe Gaps Fintech
articles.description:
Every millisecond of skew between distributed systems changes who trades first, whose ledger entry clears, and whose data audit stands up in court. Existing clock-sync and audit controls still allow invisible micro-gaps that create regulatory exposure, arbitrage leakage, and litigation risk.

Solution The Repair(â„›)â„¢ restores true timing coherence by re-phasing local oscillators and logs through a mathematically conserved model. Ultimately, the choice is yours. Yet, we recommend licensing in tandem with the repair our Time Gap Guard. If it prevents one litigation its likely paid for itself already. DataMolecular.com for more details

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45785738

Points: 1
